required_input_output_options.title: Input/output options
required_input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure. 'Default' will create a folder under output/${params.project}

required_all_tests.title: All Tests
required_all_tests.description: Required parameters for all tests performed by the pipeline.

genotypes_association.description: Genotypes for association testing (in VCF or BGEN format).

genotypes_association_format.description: Format of genotypes for association testing (BGEN vs VCF).

association_build.description: Build of genotypes for association testing (hg19 or hg38).

genotypes_prediction.description: Path to the genomic predictions (e.g. array genotypes) as a merged file in plink format).

required_single_variant_tests_only.title: Single-variant tests only
required_single_variant_tests_only.description: Required parameters specifically for single-variant tests performed by the pipeline.

required_gene_based_tests_only.title: Gene-based tests only
required_gene_based_tests_only.description: Required parameters specifically for gene-based tests performed by the pipeline.

regenie_gene_anno.description: File with variant annotations for each set

regenie_gene_masks.description: File with mask definitions using the annotations defined in regenie_gene_anno

required_interaction_tests.title: Interaction tests
required_interaction_tests.description: Required parameters for interaction tests. Starting from regenie v3.0, you can perform scans for interactions (either GxE or GxG)

regenie_interaction.description: To run GxE test specifying the interacting covariate

regenie_interaction_snp.description: To run GxG test specifying the interacting variant

required_conditional_analyses.title: Conditional analyses
required_conditional_analyses.description: Required parameters for conditional tests. Starting from regenie v3.0, you can specify genetic variants to add to the set of covariates when performing association testing.

regenie_condition_list.description: File with list of variants to condition on

phenotypes_delete_missings.description: Remove samples with missing data at any of the phenotypes

phenotypes_apply_rint.description: Apply Rank Inverse Normal Transformation (RINT) to quantitative phenotypes in both steps

genotypes_prediction_chunks.description: Number of chunks for prediction files

genotypes_association_chunk_strategy.description: Chunk strategy ('RANGE' or 'VARIANTS') for association files.

optional_pruning_step.title: Pruning step
optional_pruning_step.description: Optional parameters that can be set for the pruning step.

optional_quality_control_of_predictions.title: Quality control of predictions
optional_quality_control_of_predictions.description: Optional parameters that can be set for quality control of predictions.

optional_vcf_to_plink_conversion.title: VCF to PLINK conversion
optional_vcf_to_plink_conversion.description: Optional parameters that can be set for the VCF to PLINK conversion.

vcf_conversion_split_id.help_text: If false, family and individual IDs are set to the sample ID (using plink2 --double-id option). If true, split VCF by “_” into FID and IID (--id-delim)
vcf_conversion_split_id.description: Set family and individual IDs to the sample ID

optional_prediction_step_regenie_step_1.title: Prediction step (Regenie Step 1)
optional_prediction_step_regenie_step_1.description: Optional regenie specific parameters for the prediction step.

regenie_force_step1.description: Run regenie step 1 when >1M genotyped variants are used (not recommended)

regenie_low_mem.description: Run regenie step 1 with low_mem option

optional_single_variant_and_gene_based_t.title: Single-variant and gene-based tests (Regenie Step 2)
optional_single_variant_and_gene_based_t.description: Optional regenie specific parameters for single-variant and gene-based tests.

regenie_firth.description: Use Firth likelihood ratio test (LRT) as fallback for p-values less than threshold

regenie_firth_approx.description: Use approximate Firth LRT for computational speedup

optional_single_variant_tests_only.title: Single-variant tests only
optional_single_variant_tests_only.description: Optional regenie specific parameters for single-variant tests only.

regenie_sample_file.description: Sample file corresponding to input BGEN file

regenie_ref_first.help_text: Specify to use the first allele as the reference allele for BGEN or PLINK bed/bim/fam file input [default is to use the last allele as the reference]
regenie_ref_first.description: Use the first allele as the reference allele

optional_gene_based_tests_only.title: Gene-based tests only
optional_gene_based_tests_only.description: Optional regenie specific parameters for gene-based tests only.

regenie_gene_aaf.description: Comma-separated list of AAF upper bounds to use when building masks

regenie_gene_test.description: Comma-separated list of SKAT/ACAT-type tests to run

regenie_gene_joint.description: Comma-separated list of joint tests to apply on the generated burden masks

regenie_gene_build_mask.help_text: Build masks using the maximum number of ALT alleles across sites, or the sum of ALT alleles (‘sum’), or thresholding the sum to 2 (‘comphet’)
regenie_gene_build_mask.description: Build masks using the maximum number of ALT alleles across sites, or the sum of ALT alleles (‘sum’), or thresholding the sum to 2 (‘comphet’)

regenie_write_bed_masks.description: Write mask to PLINK bed format
regenie_write_bed_masks.help_text: Does not work when building masks with ‘sum’

regenie_gene_vc_mac_thr.description: MAC threshold below which to collapse variants in SKAT/ACAT-type tests

regenie_gene_vc_max_aaf.description: AAF upper bound to use for SKAT/ACAT-type tests

optional_interaction_tests_only.title: Interaction tests only
optional_interaction_tests_only.description: Optional regenie specific parameters for interaction tests only.

regenie_rare_mac.description: Minor allele count (MAC) threshold below which to use HLM method for QTs

regenie_no_condtl.description: Print out all the main effects from the interaction model

regenie_force_condtl.description: Include the interacting SNP as a covariate in the marginal test

optional_r_report.title: R report
optional_r_report.description: Optional parameters that can be set for the R report.

annotation_min_log10p.description: Filter and annotate results with logp10 >= 7.35

annotation_max_genes.description: Maximal number of annotated genes in Manhattan plot

plot_ylimit.description: Limit y axis in Manhattan/QQ plot for large p-values
